text: Heikki Hakola (born 11 December 1929) is a Finnish wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman flyweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Finland Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Lapua
title: Heikki Hakola
